ingredients.ingredient: 2 salmon fillets, bones and skin removed
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Place lemon slices and rosemary sprigs under salmon for natural flavoring and to prevent sticking
Don't overcook salmon—remove from heat when barely opaque at the thickest part
Coarse salt adds textural contrast and distributes seasoning more effectively than table salt
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Fresh rosemary's oils are concentrated—use discretion or it can overpower delicate salmon flavor.
